comments:
I do not know how to reproduce this one, I had an interface and a Class that
implements the interface.
I change the interface (added 4 methods) and saved it, then in the Task View I
double clicked on one error (saying the class should now implement one method of
the interface) and I got this error. Since then, I get the error all the time
when attempting to re-open the class.
I will delete the metadata that may have been saved...
